item.title: Exporting Data from R
item.description: Introduction This is the fifth post in the series Data Wrangling with R. In the previous post, we learnt to import data from JSON, XML and googlesheets. In this post, we will learn to export data/code from R. Files # readr::read_file() Lines # readr::read_lines() Summary
